abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Zoonoses Control Project for Nepal is to enhance the country
            capacity for the prevention and control of infectious
            diseases that transmit between animals and humans (zoonoses)
            under a one health approach. This restructuring paper,
            therefore, creation of a new category
            'Compensation' for reallocation of USD 886,000
            from category 'Training' to the newly established category.
